item.title: Taking your HTML elements further
item.description: When you begin learning about HTML, CSS and Javascript there is a belief many people hold that HTML is pretty useless.

item.title: The Dangers of CDN's
item.description: CDN’s are used a lot in web development to make things faster, and easier. But with everything there are pros and cons.
When we visit a page on the web we don’t tend to think too much about what makes up the page.
